An error has occurred.

It seems that an internal error occured (error unknown). This could be related to corrupted installation or files.
Please contact us and try re-installing Pagico to resolve this problem.

When you're reporting this issue to us, make sure you tell us what system you are using (Win or Mac, PPC Mac or Intel Mac, and Operating System version, etc). That'll be of great help for us to resolve the problem.

A screenshot of the problem will greatly help us as well.
